dataList.dlg: A defeated kingdom has no place for a Prince... Thus, he must rise to the occasion and crown himself its monarch.
Dedicating your mornings to be in the King's audience is, indeed, a most commendable demonstration of fealty. I shall trust in your continued support in this effort to build our new Family.

Noon... passengers bound for P Corp. will be boarding soon. And when they do, this sanguine pressure, the responsibility to rebuild the Family will doubtless become unbearable.
The responsibility bestowed upon me... as the new Third Kindred.

Night does not descend upon this kingdom. But... I know by instinct that now is the hour of the Parade.
The corners of my lips are... twitching... I have to... smile.

Maman... has expressed that the Parade has no end...
All I have to do is... complete my role within this continuing procession.

Bridle your hunger for the first month; create no more than a single Bloodbag a day, and let the humans fight amongst themselves.
Only those who rise above the rest shall be permitted to join our Family.
Enough. Create too many of us, and we risk the discovery of our furtive kingdom; thus, return and slumber. Sleep, until eons pass and the next procession is prepared...
Kneel before me and display propriety. Do not lower your head, for I wish to remember the countenance of those in my service.

Raise your heads high, march forth with gusto, and make the crowd smile.
Let this procession demonstrate the elation of the joyful existence that awaits the kingdom's new subjects.
There are no meaningful differences between the role I was given at birth, and the role that was bestowed upon me as a Bloodfiend of the procession. I am only what is expected of me.

The Parade commences. Open the palace gates and let the soldiers take the vanguard in this procession.
This is the endlessly, eternally blessed Carnival... So, do enjoy yourselves.
Time to open the gates, is it?
Witness the King's march.
Are you enjoying the banquet?
The Parade and its Finale.
That's it. Kneel.
... Hah. Blood... more blood...!
You... are too feeble to join the Family.
Thus, in the end... our royal Family too, marches to ruin...
With this, another obstacle to the Parade is removed.
I've had my fill of failures, but... this too shall I endure.

That was an acceptable march for a dress rehearsal.
Heed me, O Family of mine and its royal subjectsâ€”prepare the new Parade, for what comes next shall be even greater.

Do not cease this procession, not until we rise beyond this narrow kingdom, not until we return to that land of our ruin.
Behold, as they gaze upon us in awe...

... Was that not enough blood...?! Nngh... Return to the shadows... we need only begin anew.
It's... all the same, anyway.
